title: Philips Announces New Hue Bulbs, Hue Bridge 2.0 With HomeKit Compatibility
text:
Philips Announces New Hue Bulbs, Hue Bridge 2.0 With HomeKit Compatibility 
Published By: MacRumors.com - Today 
Philips today announced its first HomeKit-enabled product, debuting the Hue Bridge 2.0, an updated version of its original Hue Bridge. With ...
